privacy_intro: At 3skici, we value the privacy of our users and are committed to maintaining a transparent and trustworthy relationship with them. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit or use our platform.
privacy_agreement: By accessing or using 3skici, you agree to the collection and use of your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Please read it carefully.
personal_information_text: When you register as a seller or buyer, we collect information such as your name, email address, phone number, and any other contact information you provide to create your account or communicate with other users.
transaction_information_text: We may collect information related to your transactions on the platform, such as products listed or purchased, including product details, payment methods, and transaction history. Please note that 3skici does not process payments directly; payments are handled between buyers and sellers.
usage_data_text: We collect information on how you interact with the platform, including your IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, time spent on pages, and other diagnostic data. This helps us understand user behavior and improve our services.
cookies_text: 3skici uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that allow us to recognize your preferences and personalize your experience on the platform. You can manage cookie settings through your browser.
provide_improve_services: To Provide and Improve Our Services
provide_improve_services_text: We use your personal information to create and manage your account, process transactions, and communicate with you regarding your listings or inquiries. We also analyze usage data to enhance the platform’s functionality and user experience.
facilitate_communication_text: We use your contact information to send you important notifications related to your account, transactions, or changes to our services. Additionally, we use this information to facilitate communication between buyers and sellers through the platform.
marketing_purposes_text: With your consent, we may send you updates, newsletters, and promotional offers related to 3skici. You can opt out of these communications at any time by following the unsubscribe link in the emails or by updating your preferences in your account settings.
ensure_compliance_text: We may use your information to ensure compliance with our platform’s policies and to prevent fraudulent or illegal activities.
data_security_text: We implement robust security measures to safeguard your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
access_rights_text: You have the right to request access to the personal data we hold about you.
rectification_rights_text: You can request corrections if your personal data is inaccurate or incomplete.
erasure_rights_text: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data under certain conditions.
portability_rights_text: You can request a copy of your data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
